question.title: Formatting the first symbol of a string to be upper case - a private method or formatting on the go?
question.body:
In a class that has a bunch of functions, should I be making a separate private method specifically for formatting or should I just be formatting in every function that requires a string to be formatted?

Method for formatting:

private String formatItemName(String item) {
    item = item.toLowerCase();                     // make all letters lowercase
    return item.substring(0, 1).toUpperCase()      // capitalize first letter
            + item.substring(1);                   // add the rest
}
